title: N /C Men Cotton Nightshirt, Short Sleeve V-Neck Soft Loose Nightwear
features: Material: Made of high-quality cotton material, eco-friendly and no peculiar smell, soft and breathable, skin-friendly and elastic, cool and comfortable to wear.
Feature: The collar design is V-neck, it won't tie your neck, the appropriate length and loose style give you plenty of room to move, making you feel comfortable.
Size & Color: S/ M/ L/ XL/ XXL, five sizes are available, which can adapt to almost all figures. Please check the details of our products in the specifications, color: black/ gray/ red/ blue.
Appearance: The pajama adopts dark color as the main color, with the striped pattern on the cuff and collar. The length above the knee will better highlight your figure and muscle curves.
Occasions: Suitable for men of all ages, these pajamas are perfect for wearing at home during breaks or your leisure time, so you don't have to change even when guests are visiting.
